title: Reset Password
content: Users can reset password from Settings > Security.

title: Refund Policy
content: Refunds are allowed within 7 days of purchase.

title: Change Email
content: Users can change their registered email address from Settings > Account Information.

title: Delete Account
content: Users can permanently delete their account from Settings > Privacy > Delete Account.

title: Subscription Plans
content: We offer Basic, Pro, and Enterprise subscription plans. Users can upgrade from the Billing section.

title: Cancel Subscription
content: Users can cancel their subscription anytime from Settings > Billing > Cancel Subscription.

title: Update Payment Method
content: Users can update their payment method from Settings > Billing > Payment Methods.

title: Two-Factor Authentication
content: Users can enable two-factor authentication from Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication.

title: Contact Support
content: Users can contact support through the Help Center or by emailing support@example.com.

title: Data Privacy
content: We follow strict data privacy standards and do not share user data with third parties without consent.

title: Account Verification
content: Users must verify their email address after registration by clicking the verification link sent to their inbox.

title: Login Issues
content: If users cannot log in, they should reset their password or ensure their account is verified.

title: Profile Update
content: Users can update their profile information from Settings > Profile.

title: Download Invoice
content: Users can download their invoices from Settings > Billing > Invoices.

title: Upgrade Plan
content: Users can upgrade their subscription plan from the Billing section at any time.

title: Downgrade Plan
content: Users can downgrade their subscription plan from Settings > Billing > Manage Plan.

title: Account Suspension
content: Accounts may be suspended if they violate our terms of service.

title: Terms of Service
content: Users must agree to our Terms of Service before using the platform.

title: Password Requirements
content: Passwords must contain at least 8 characters, including one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.

title: Session Timeout
content: For security reasons, user sessions automatically expire after 30 minutes of inactivity.

title: Notification Settings
content: Users can manage email and push notifications from Settings > Notifications.

title: Language Preferences
content: Users can change the application language from Settings > Preferences.

title: Dark Mode
content: Users can enable dark mode from Settings > Appearance.

title: Data Export
content: Users can export their personal data from Settings > Privacy > Export Data.

title: Security Alerts
content: Users receive security alerts via email if suspicious activity is detected.
